github_issue.title: Fix WebSocket Instability and ABNORMAL_CLOSURE (1006)
github_issue.body:
Part of #54.

The client reports intermittent `ABNORMAL_CLOSURE` (1006) errors with no specific reason. Connection is restored quickly, but this impacts stability.

Logs show:
`21:34:54.618 installHook.js:1 [STT] [WARN] CONNECTION_CLOSED: Connection closed unexpectedly | {"component":"STTWebSocketClient","code":1006,"reason":"(no reason)","wasClean":false,"recoverable":true,"errorCode":"ABNORMAL_CLOSURE"}`
